meanings: Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Trade ((abb.)MOFAT)
Department of Political Science and Diplomacy

vlive.korean: 이게 국가적으로도 외교적으로도 굉장히 좋고 - 외교 안보적으로. This is very diplomatic, so it's good. - True. 듣기 View video tvN : tvN '신서유기 외전-꽃보다 청춘 위너' LIVE TALK (Here Comes Trouble: Unplanned Trip LIVE TALK)
vlive.english: This is very diplomatic, so it's good. - True.

vlive.korean: 근데 저는 초등학교 3학년때인가 되게 외교관이 꿈이었어거든요. But when I was in 3rd grade, I wanted to become a diplomat. 듣기 View video GFRIEND : 졸업했어요 😄
vlive.english: But when I was in 3rd grade, I wanted to become a diplomat.

vlive.korean: 외교 관계가 조금 안정이 된다면 아마 방송이 되지 않을까 싶습니다. I think we have to wait until the diplomatic issues get solved. 듣기 View video Park Hae Jin : [습격] 창단식 게임 예선전 현장
vlive.english: I think we have to wait until the diplomatic issues get solved.

examples.korean: The two countries have severed all diplomatic links. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 두 국가는 모든 외교 관계를 단절했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The two countries have severed all diplomatic links. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Settling the dispute required great tact and diplomacy. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 분쟁을 해결하는 데는 대단한 요령과 외교술이 요구되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Settling the dispute required great tact and diplomacy. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: After his election defeat he was reassigned to the diplomatic service. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 선거 패배 후 그는 외교관으로 새로 발령을 받았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: After his election defeat he was reassigned to the diplomatic service. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: the establishment of diplomatic relations between the countries 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 국가들 간의 외교 관계 수립 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: the establishment of diplomatic relations between the countries Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The country remained diplomatically isolated. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 나라는 외교적으로 계속 고립되어 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The country remained diplomatically isolated. Add to Wordbook
